revision.text: Create or edit an IARPA Source Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPASourceConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPASourceConcept|namespace=IConcept}} ---- [[MappingSummary|Frame to Concept mapping summary]] ---- {{#ask: [[Category:IARPASourceConcept]] [[:IConcept:+]] |?HasConceptOwner=Owner |?HasConceptDefinition=Definition |?HasConceptLUs=LUs |format=table |sort=HasConceptOwner, }} ---- This category uses the form [[Has default form::IARPASourceConcept]].

This category uses the form [[Has default form::IARPATargetConcept]].
Create or Edit a new Target Concept: {{#forminput:form=IARPATargetConcept|namespace=IConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPATargetConcept}} ---- {{#ask: [[Category:IARPATargetConcept]] |?HasConceptOwner=Owner |?HasConceptType=Type |?HasConceptGroup=Group |?HasConceptDefinition=Definition |?Is linked to from frame=Frames |format=table |sort=HasConceptGroup,HasConceptOwner, }} ----

revision.comment: Created page with "This is the Linguistic metaphor category."
revision.text: This is the Linguistic metaphor category.

This is the linguistic metaphor category, which includes only the subset of [[Candidate linguistic metaphors|candidate linguistic metaphors]] that are not indicated in by the [[:Property:Verification status|Verification status]] property as non metaphorical (or garbage). The list thus presently includes any candidate linguistic metaphor that has not been manually excluded. Linguistic metaphors are added automatically, but can be edited manually using the following [[Has default form::Linguistic metaphor|form]].
Numerical summary: * {{#ask:[[Category:Linguistic metaphor]] [[ Linguistic metaphor.Type::extracted]]|format=count}} extracted LMs * {{#ask:[[Category:Linguistic metaphor]] [[ Linguistic metaphor.Type::seed]]|format=count}} seed LMs
= Extracted Linguistic Metaphors = {{#ask:[[Category:Linguistic metaphor]] [[ Linguistic metaphor.Type::extracted]] | format=category | limit=1000 }}
= Seed Linguistic Metaphors =
{{#ask:[[Category:Linguistic metaphor]] [[ Linguistic metaphor.Type::seed]] | format=category | limit=1000 }} __CATEGORYNOPAGES__

revision.comment: Created page with "This category should be edited with the form [[Has default form::Frame family]]."
revision.text: This category should be edited with the form [[Has default form::Frame family]].

A category to identify the portion of Metaphors that were manually entered or approved by Linguistic analysts. This category uses the form [[Has default form::Metaphor]].
[[Category:Metaphor]]

This is the VettedFrame category. It is used to identify the portion of Frames that were manually entered or approved by Linguistic analysts. This category uses the form [[Has default form::Frame]].
[[Category:Frame]]
